Calculate Yearly Summary Statistics for Nitrate Data

Source: R/calculate_yearly_stats.R
calculate_yearly_stats.Rd

calculates yearly summary statistics for nitrate concentration data.

Usage

calculate_yearly_stats(nitrate_data, sites = NULL)

Arguments

nitrate_data

A dataframe containing nitrate concentration data

sites

Character vector of site IDs to include. If NULL, includes all sites.

Value

A tibble with yearly summary statistics

Examples

yearly_stats <- calculate_yearly_stats(nitrate_clean)
head(yearly_stats)
#> # A tibble: 6 × 7
#>   siteID year  yearly_mean yearly_sd yearly_max yearly_min n_year
#>   <chr>  <chr>       <dbl>     <dbl>      <dbl>      <dbl>  <int>
#> 1 ARIK   2018         5.29      3.19       14.1       -0.9    209
#> 2 ARIK   2019         5.30      2.06       17.7       -0.7    259
#> 3 ARIK   2020         5.84      1.80       18         -0.3    207
#> 4 ARIK   2021         7.13      4.28       59.5       -0.1    201
#> 5 ARIK   2022         6.56      3.52       30.1       -0.9    226
#> 6 COMO   2018         6.15      2.80       15.4        0.2    260

# Calculate daily statistics for specific sites:
selected_sites <- c("MAYF")
yearly_stats_selected <- calculate_daily_stats(nitrate_clean, sites = selected_sites)
head(yearly_stats_selected)
#> # A tibble: 6 × 7
#>   siteID date       daily_mean daily_sd daily_max daily_min n_observations
#>   <chr>  <date>          <dbl>    <dbl>     <dbl>     <dbl>          <int>
#> 1 MAYF   2018-07-07       9.06    2.53       13.6       5.4             65
#> 2 MAYF   2018-07-08       4.35    0.391       5.2       3.6             90
#> 3 MAYF   2018-07-09       3.49    0.150       3.9       3.3             94
#> 4 MAYF   2018-07-10       4.47    0.882      10.4       3.3             96
#> 5 MAYF   2018-07-11       9.4     4.00       16.7       4.6             96
#> 6 MAYF   2018-07-12       4.32    0.111       4.6       4.1             64
